meanings.definition: A type of tobacco used in pipe smoking.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the aroma of latakias in my pipe.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper recommended a blend with latakias for my pipe.
meanings.sent3: The latakias in the pipe seemed to whisper stories of distant lands.
meanings.sent4: The latakias added a touch of mystery to the smoke swirling around.
meanings.sent5: The latakias filled the room with a rich, smoky fragrance.

meanings.definition: The plural form of latakia, a type of tobacco used in pipe smoking.
meanings.sent1: The tobacconist displayed various latakias in his shop.
meanings.sent2: Many pipe enthusiasts prefer blends with latakias.
meanings.sent3: The latakias on the shelf looked like a colorful tobacco rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the sweet scent of latakias.
meanings.sent5: The latakias in the jar beckoned with their earthy aroma.
